message.body: I'm sitting in a waiting room. The tv has pigs on it.
And someone just said "He was probably high too!"
Animal planet beats fox news for waiting room tv. I always get stuck with fox news in airports.
I get stuck with it while working out. Its like you want to get physically stronger and mentally weaker?
The conversations I'm hearing are hilarious. I now know about some guy's ... I cant even repeat it.
Oh dear. The joys and perils of waiting room eavesdropping!
The person got called away. Five more minutes and I would have probably known things that would haunt my dreams.
I sometimes enjoy the snippets of conversations I hear just walking down the street.
I especially like the irony of a woman yelling loudly into her phone about how she's mad at someone else for broadcasting her personal business to the world.
Believe it or not i'm in a totally different waiting room now.
Its super noisy in this one
And some little girl announcing to her dad "but it says no cell phones!" over and over.
This kid is trying to rat me out!
Not a kid. Its a grown woman, i just couldnt see her.
Haha! that's funny. I have to go get some lunch now.
